title.rendered: Samir Kocchar celebrates Christmas Day with Smile Foundation kids

content.rendered:
Actor Samir Kocchar celebrated Christmas Day with Smile Foundation kids on the 25th of December 2016. The talented children sang, danced and drew beautiful pictures with the actor.

The children also cut a cake with the actor and interacted with him, asking him various questions. The actor also spoke about his support for Smile Foundation’s campaign My Mission Education which champions for the cause of child education.
